Statute.Title: Electoral Boundaries Readjustment Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Révision des limites des circonscriptions électorales, Loi sur la)

Minister.Text: Leader of the Government in the House of Commons see SI/2025-55

Section.Text: R.S., c. 6 (2nd Supp.), s. 3; R.S., c. 1 (4th Supp.), s. 45 (Sch. III, item 9(2))(F); 2011, c. 26, s. 8
R.S., c. 6 (2nd Supp.), s. 6; R.S., c. 1 (4th Supp.), s. 23

General.Text: General, Electoral Districts, proposals for the provinces:

Convention.Text: Alberta, Canada Gazette, Part I, Supplement, 14.07.2012; 2014, c. 19, ss. 26 to 29
British Columbia, Canada Gazette, Part I, Supplement, 04.08.2012; 2014, c. 19, ss. 30 and 31
Manitoba, Canada Gazette, Part I, Supplement, 08.09.2012
New Brunswick, Canada Gazette, Part I, Supplement, 21.07.2012
Nova Scotia, Canada Gazette, Part I, Supplement, 04.08.2012
Ontario, Canada Gazette, Part I, Supplement, 08.09.2012; 2014, c. 19, ss. 15 to 24
Prince Edward Island, Canada Gazette, Part I, Supplement, 08.09.2012
Quebec, Canada Gazette, Part I, Supplement, 04.08.2012; 2014, c. 19, ss. 2 to 14
Saskatchewan, Canada Gazette, Part I, Supplement, 11.08.2012; 2014, c. 19, s. 25

General.Text: General, Report of the Commission for the province of Ontario, Canada Gazette, Part I, Extra, Vol. 147, No. 4, 30.09.2013

Transitional.Text: Transitional, R.S., c. 6 (2nd Supp.), s. 8 re ss. 21 and 22

CIF.Text: CIF, R.S., c. 6 (2nd Supp.) proclaimed in force 06.03.86 see SI/86‑49
CIF, R.S., c. 1 (4th Supp.), ss. 22, 23 and 45 in force 04.02.88
CIF, 1993, c. 28, s. 78, (Sch. III, ss. 45 to 45.3) in force 01.04.99 see s. 79
CIF, 1998, c. 15, s. 25 in force on assent 11.06.98
CIF, 2000, c. 9, s. 559 in force 01.09.2000 see Canada Gazette, Part I, Extra Vol. 134, No. 6, 01.09.2000
CIF, 2001, c. 21, s. 27 in force on assent 14.06.2001
CIF, 2004, c. 1, s. 2 in force on assent 11.03.2004
CIF, 2011, c. 26, ss. 3 to 12 and 14 to 22 in force on assent 16.12.2011
CIF, SI/2013-102, signed 01.10.2013, (order in Council P.C. 2013-963 of 27.09.2013), Proclamation declaring the representation order to be in force, effective 02.08.2015 see SI/2015-75
CIF, 2014, c. 12, s. 136 in force on assent 19.06.2014 see s. 158(1);

Item.Text: — s. 147 in force 19.12.2014, unless, before, the Chief Electoral Officer publishes a notice in the Canada Gazette, in which case they come into force on the day on which the notice is published see s. 158(3).

CIF.Text: CIF, 2014, c. 19, ss. 1 to 32 in force on assent 19.06.2014.
CIF, 2015, c. 3, ss. 78 to 80 in force on assent 26.02.2015.
CIF, 2018, c.31, s. 392 in force 19.01.2019, see Canada Gazette Part 1, Vol. 153, No. 3 pages 176 and 177
